item.title: 01 выпуск 04 сезона. ROM 1.0.0, Assets For Lotus, Bytecode cache in Ruby 2.3, The Website Obesity Crisis, Searchkit и прочее
item.description:
Добрый день уважаемые слушатели. Представляем новый выпуск подкаста RWpod. В этом выпуске:

Ruby

  • ROM 1.0.0 Released, Introducing Assets For Lotus и Bytecode cache is experimentally released in Ruby 2.3
  • Stream Comments with Rails 5 and ActionCable, Using RSpec Metadata и Refactoring in Ruby: Smelly Parameters Lists
  • How to compare version strings in Ruby, The FILTER clause in Postgres 9.4 и Ordering by nulls on Postgres
  • ETag caching gotcha in Roda + Nginx, Ruby’s Object#tap: a better use и Rubyfu - Ruby for hacker book

JavaScript

  • JavaScript: 2015 in Review, 10 Most Recommended JavaScript Scene Articles of 2015, Looking back on 2015: six exciting web technologies и 2016 will be the year of concurrency on the web
  • The Website Obesity Crisis, Web Components Are Dead? и Getting started with Progressive Web Apps
  • Electron-window-state - a library to store and restore window sizes and positions for your Electron app, Searchkit is a suite of React components that communicate directly with your Elasticsearch cluster и MailDev - SMTP Server + Web Interface for viewing and testing emails during development
  • Cannon.js - a lightweight 3D physics engine written in JavaScript, DocSearch - the easiest way to add search to your documentation и Sharer.js - create custom social share elements on DOM objects
